title: ISic001245. I.Sicily inscription 001245
body:
Facsimile Images

Α͡ΣΟ++[---]
ΝΙΔΙΑΣΝΒΙΓ[---]
κὲ ἀ<μ>έμπ͡τ[ῳ---]

Apparatus criticus

Text after Gualtherus; Kaibel: νιδίᾳ συνβίῳ [χρηστῇ]
3: Gualtherus prints a '.' after ΚΕ, which may signify either an interpunct or a lacuna.

translation

commentary

The restoration of ἀμέμπτῳ (or a vocative form, as Franz suggested) in the final line by Kaibel seems very plausible, but the more extensive attempt to resolve line 2 seems more speculative; however, it should be noted that the chrestos kai amemptos formula is not otherwise attested at Messana and more typical of the south-east. Kaibel does not clarify that the inscription appears in the addenda of Gualtherus, p.100.

bibliography

  • Gualtherus 1624 [1625] 100 no. 4 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001931
  • 3.5637 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001252
  • 14.0418 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
